=======
CHANGES
=======

Release 0.0.2
-------------

* [Changes]

  * When '-S', '-a retrieve', '-X', or '-a statements' specified,
    phptenjin command replaces text before expressions into spaces
    and print it.

* [Bugfix]

  * pytenjin command printed "\n\n" instead of "\n" when '-U' specified.
    Fixed to print "\n".
